  • What is TrueWireless Mirroring?

Qualcomm TrueWireless Mirroring know-how delivers strong, seamless connectivity for a really immersive audio expertise. With mirroring know-how, just one earbud maintains the Bluetooth connection with the smartphone, whereas the secondary bud mirrors the related bud. If a shopper removes the related earbud, the secondary earbud assumes the connection with zero interruption. Or if the connection between the smartphone and mirroring bud is stronger than the related bud, the connection will invisibly swap to make sure the absolute best connection.

  • How do the twin mic work?

One mic is for capturing your voice in one of the simplest ways, the opposite is for lowering the ambient noise round. Both mics work collectively to optimize the decision efficiency. Each earbud has 2 mics in-built. You could make calls with single earbud or each collectively as wanted.
